query:
SELECT d.deployment_url
        FROM projects p
        LEFT JOIN deployments d ON (
            CASE
                WHEN p.active_deployment_id IS NOT NULL
                THEN d.id = p.active_deployment_id
                ELSE d.id = (
                    SELECT id FROM deployments
                    WHERE project_id = p.id
                    ORDER BY created_at DESC
                    LIMIT 1
                )
            END
        )
        WHERE p.id = $1
        LIMIT 1
